channel.title: The Weekly Challenge
channel.description: Recent content on The Weekly Challenge

item.title: Advent Calendar - December 8, 2025
item.description: Advent Calendar 2025 | Day 7 | Day 8 | The gift is presented by Jaldhar H. Vyas. Today he is talking about his solutioni to The Weekly Challenge - 310. This is re-produced for Advent Calendar 2025 from the original post. Challenge 1: Arrays Intersection You are given a list of array of integers. Write a script to return the common elements in all the arrays. Example 1 Input: $list = ( [1, 2, 3, 4], [4, 5, 6, 1], [4, 2, 1, 3] ) Output: (1, 4) Example 2 Input: $list = ( [1, 0, 2, 3], [2, 4, 5] ) Output: (2) Example 3 Input: $list = ( [1, 2, 3], [4, 5], [6] ) Output: () This is another challenge we can solve with a Raku one-liner:

item.title: Advent Calendar 2025
item.description: | 2019 | 2020 | 2021 | 2022 | 2023 | 2024 | 2025 | Here we are, kicking off another Advent season. It’s amazing to look back and see how far we’ve come - and none of it would have been possible without the energy, passion, and teamwork of everyone in Team PWC. Thanks for bringing the magic to life once again! MON

item.title: RECAP - The Weekly Challenge - 350
item.description: TABLE OF CONTENTS 1. HEADLINES 2. STAR CONTRIBUTORS 3. CONTRIBUTION STATS 4. GUESTS 5. LANGUAGES 6. CENTURION CLUB 7. DAMIAN CONWAY’s CORNER 8. ANDREW SHITOV’s CORNER 9. PERL SOLUTIONS 10. RAKU SOLUTIONS 11. PERL & RAKU SOLUTIONS HEADLINES Thank you Team PWC for your continuous support and encouragement. STAR CONTRIBUTORS Following members shared solutions to both tasks in Perl and Raku as well as blogged about it.

item.title: The Weekly Challenge - 351
item.description: TABLE OF CONTENTS 1. HEADLINES 2. SPONSOR 3. RECAP 4. PERL REVIEW 5. RAKU REVIEW 6. CHART 7. NEW MEMBERS 8. GUESTS 9. TASK #1: Special Average 10. TASK #2: Arithmetic Progression HEADLINES Welcome to the Week #351 of The Weekly Challenge. Let us all welcome, Gerben Vos to Team PWC. Thanks Gerben for the first contributions in Perl. Last week, I completely forgot to announce the champion in all the excitement.

item.title: Advent Calendar - December 7, 2025
item.description: Advent Calendar 2025 | Day 6 | Day 7 | Day 8 | The gift is presented by Luca Ferrari. Today he is talking about his solution to The Weekly Challenge - 309. This is re-produced for Advent Calendar 2025 from the original post. This post presents my solutions to the Perl Weekly Challenge 309. I keep doing the Perl Weekly Challenge in order to mantain my coding skills in good shape, as well as in order to learn new things, with particular regard to Raku, a language that I love.

item.title: The Weekly Challenge - Guest Contributions
item.description: As you know, The Weekly Challenge, primarily focus on Perl and Raku. During the Week #018, we received solutions to The Weekly Challenge - 018 by Orestis Zekai in Python. It was pleasant surprise to receive solutions in something other than Perl and Raku. Ever since regular team members also started contributing in other languages like Ada, APL, Awk, BASIC, Bash, Bc, Befunge-93, Bourne Shell, BQN, Brainfuck, C3, C, CESIL, Chef, COBOL, Coconut, C Shell, C++, Clojure, Crystal, CUDA, D, Dart, Dc, Elixir, Elm, Emacs Lisp, Erlang, Excel VBA, F#, Factor, Fennel, Fish, Forth, Fortran, Gembase, Gleam, GNAT, Go, GP, Groovy, Haskell, Haxe, HTML, Hy, Idris, IO, J, Janet, Java, JavaScript, Julia, K, Kap, Korn Shell, Kotlin, Lisp, Logo, Lua, M4, Maxima, Miranda, Modula 3, MMIX, Mumps, Myrddin, Nelua, Nim, Nix, Node.

item.title: Advent Calendar - December 6, 2025
item.description: Advent Calendar 2025 | Day 5 | Day 6 | Day 7 | The gift is presented by Arne Sommer. Today he is talking about his solution to The Weekly Challenge - 308. This is re-produced for Advent Calendar 2025 from the original post. Challenge #308.1: Count Common You are given two array of strings, @str1 and @str2. Write a script to return the count of common strings in both arrays.

item.title: Advent Calendar - December 5, 2025
item.description: Advent Calendar 2025 | Day 4 | Day 5 | Day 6 | The gift is presented by Matthias Muth. Today he is talking about his solution to The Weekly Challenge - 307. This is re-produced for Advent Calendar 2025 from the original post. Task 1: Check Order You are given an array of integers, @ints. Write a script to re-arrange the given array in an increasing order and return the indices where it differs from the original array.

item.title: Advent Calendar - December 4, 2025
item.description: Advent Calendar 2025 | Day 3 | Day 4 | Day 5 | The gift is presented by Peter Campbell Smith. Today he is talking about his solution to The Weekly Challenge - 306. This is re-produced for Advent Calendar 2025 from the original post. Task â€” Odd sum You are given an array of positive integers, @ints. Write a script to return the sum of all possible odd-length subarrays of the given array.

item.title: Advent Calendar - December 3, 2025
item.description: Advent Calendar 2025 | Day 2 | Day 3 | Day 4 | The gift is presented by Jorg Sommrey. Today he is talking about his solution to The Weekly Challenge - 305. This is re-produced for Advent Calendar 2025 from the original post. Alien Primes Task 1: Binary Prefix You are given a binary array. Write a script to return an array of booleans where the partial binary number up to that point is prime.
